comments.general: Here are all comments, as JSON does't allow comments, and Angular/TS complains about unknown tsconfig properties

compilerOptions.esModuleInterop: Necessary for incompatible modules to import, like PubSub, socket.io
compilerOptions.isolatedModules: will guarantee that code can be transpiled per-file basis. It will not help in transpilation, but `tsc` over the whole project would notice problematic code
compilerOptions.preserveSymlinks: will keep symlinked colabo puzzles to keep the local context where they are linked, rather than where they exist
compilerOptions.target: we cannot go beyond `es2015` as `zone.js` cannot handle native async/await on es2016++

comments.allowSyntheticDefaultImports: cannot be false, as needed for `esModuleInterop` parameter, though we can omit it
